data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 2, Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alaves are whistled for offside.
In the minute 5, Elche have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Alaves.
Free kick for Elche in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 7, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Elche throw-in in Alaves's half.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Elche have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Elche at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 12, Elche to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Free kick Elche.
Elche are caught offside.
In the minute 16, Lucas Perez of Alaves is pulled up for offside.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz Alaves's Lucas Perez is caught offside.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 19, In Vitoria-Gasteiz, Ximo Navarro (Alaves) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Elche advance rapidly upfield but Adrian Cordero Vega blows for offside.
Free kick for Elche in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 21, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Elche's area.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Elche are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 25, Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Alaves.
In the minute 26, Ivan Marcone is booked for the away team.
Edgar Mendez's header is off-target for Alaves.
Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Alaves.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 30, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Florian Lejeune for Alaves has been booked by Adrian Cordero Vega and receives a first yellow card.
Elche have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, In Vitoria-Gasteiz, Adrian Marin of Alaves is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Dani Calvo (Elche) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Elche.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 37, Jota (Alaves) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Elche.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Pere Milla puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Tete Morente instrumental with a fine assist.
Alaves are pushing forward but Ximo Navarro's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Elche at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Elche have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Corner awarded to Elche.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Adrian Cordero Vega blows against Alaves's Lucas Perez for offside.
In the minute 45, Adrian Cordero Vega blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
Jorge Almiron is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de Mendizorroza with Emiliano Rigoni replacing Juan Sanchez Mino.
In the minute 46, Victor Laguardia is replacing Florian Lejeune for the home team.
Corner awarded to Elche.
In the minute 47, Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tete Morente (Elche) has received a yellow card from Adrian Cordero Vega.
Alaves's Joselu misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards the home team a throw-in.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Free kick Alaves.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Elche have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Elche have a goal kick.
Elche drives forward and Tete Morente gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Alaves push forward at Estadio de Mendizorroza and Joselu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Elche defence.
In the minute 55, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Elche throw-in in Alaves's half.
Elche drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elche's half?
Josan (Elche) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Edgar Mendez with Borja Sainz. This is the second substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
Tomas Pina is on a sub for Jota for Alaves.
Javi Lopez is replacing Adrian Marin for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 64, Alaves have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Important block from the Elche defence as Lucas Perez fires in a strike for Alaves.
Goal kick for Elche at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Jorge Almiron (Elche) is making a second substitution, with Omenuke Mfulu replacing Ivan Marcone.
Free kick for Elche in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 67, At Estadio de Mendizorroza, Rodrigo Ely has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Josan is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Josan returns to the field for Elche after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 71, Elche have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Elche.
Throw-in high up the field for Elche in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 76, Tomas Pina (Alaves) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 76, Alaves to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
Pere Milla (Elche) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 78, Emiliano Rigoni (Elche) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
In Vitoria-Gasteiz Alaves attack through Joselu. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 81, Adrian Cordero Vega awards Elche a goal kick.
Alaves are coming forward and Ximo Navarro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
The home team have replaced Rodrigo Ely with Luis Rioja. This is the fifth substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Guido Carrillo is replacing Josan for Elche at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Throw-in for Elche in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 84, Jorge Almiron (Elche) is making a fourth substitution, with Diego Gonzalez replacing Emiliano Rigoni.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Goal! Tete Morente extends Elche's lead to 0-2.
Great play from Fidel to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 88, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Alaves.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Free kick Elche.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Alaves.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Elche.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team replace Tete Morente with Luismi.
